phoenix::Chain

phoenix::Chain Class Reference

Chain Class This class is the top level in the molecular tree structure. It has a name, a ResidueList with all residues and a tag. More...

Detailed Description

Chain Class This class is the top level in the molecular tree structure. It has a name, a ResidueList with all residues and a tag.

Friends And Related Function Documentation

Delete a residue.
